contentList.content: Eat your heart out, Sceleritas Fel.
Your desire for the blood of your enemies drives you to strike their weak points more often. Your Critical hit threshold is reduced by [1].
Blood fills your pores and seeps between the layers of your skin, then clots up. While not wearing armor, your AC becomes [1] plus your Strength and Constitution modifiers.
You get some freaky joy from blood between your toes. When you enter a blood surface, you soak it up and regain hit points equal to 2d4 plus your Strength modifier.
When you crit, your target gains two stacks of Arterial Puncture.
Your nails muster(d) the strength to pierce enemy resistance and immunity to Slashing damage.

Your nails have grown to relish blood and violence as much as you do. Make an attack with your little homegrown meatcarvers. Weirdo. I bet you think pickles are good when you chop them up and use them as a topping.
